Module ru.nsu.lebedev.snake
Package ru.nsu.lebedev.snake.models

Class ModelSettings

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.lebedev.snake.models.ModelSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelContract
public class ModelSettings extends Object implements ModelContract
The ModelSettings class is responsible for managing game settings. It loads settings from a JSON file and can save updated settings back to the file.
